node.title: Father who violently shook baby daughter has 'no explanation, no contrition or remorse'
node.alt: The exterior of a courthouse building in Adelaide
node.description: A man found guilty of recklessly causing harm to his newborn baby by violently shaking her has been bashed in prison and is withdrawn, depressed and suicidal, an Adelaide court hears.
node.content:
["A man found guilty of recklessly causing harm to his newborn baby by violently shaking her has provided \"no explanation\", \"contrition\" or \"remorse\", an Adelaide court has heard.", "Daniel James Morgan caused head injuries and life threatening harm to his daughter at their home in Paralowie in Adelaide's north in 2018.", "Morgan had pleaded not guilty, claiming he had accidentally fallen on his infant daughter while she was sleeping on a mattress.", "But Judge Liesl Chapman said that was \"implausible\" and found Morgan had violently shaken the 11-week-old.", "In a District Court sentencing hearing today, Judge\u00a0Chapman said Morgan had demonstrated \"no explanation, no contrition or remorse\".", "\"Even at this late stage, if there were some sort of acknowledgement that something went wrong in his own mind, that he would get some help,\" she said.", "Judge Chapman said she had \"seen his temper\" which he had showed \"loudly in court\", and that the lack of further explanation for the injuries did not leave her \"much to work with\".", "\"I've got a young man who's lost control to such an extent that he's violently shaking his own daughter and caused her catastrophic injuries,\" she said.", "", "
Judge Liesl Chapman said Morgan had shown his temper in court.(ABC News)
", "
Morgan 'bashed' in prison
", "Morgan's defence lawyer,\u00a0Adam Richards, said his client had a happy childhood and did not have alcohol or drug issues at the time the incident occurred.", "He said the charges had caused Morgan to become \"withdrawn, depressed\" and \"suicidal\".", "Mr Richards said Morgan had also been attacked in prison by \"two men who went into his cell and bashed him for a period of time\".", "He said the attack had forced him into \"protection\" in prison and caused anxiety for Morgan.", "Mr Richards said Morgan knew \"no matter what the court does, he's lost his daughter\".", "Morgan will be sentenced next week.", "
Baby previously 'quite happy'
", "The court previously heard the baby was healthy and \"quite happy, very alert and settled\" when she was left alone in Morgan's care that day.", "She had been fed and Morgan \"didn't have anything to do besides watch the baby\" but the court heard he found it difficult to read the baby's cues.", "After the incident, Morgan rang triple-0, telling the operator\u00a0\"all of a sudden she's just stopped breathing \u2026 just like she's not alert\".", "He followed up by saying he was cleaning and \"I fell down and I put my hand down and I don't know if I fell on her or the pillow\".", "Morgan also rang the baby's mother, saying: \"You need to come home or need to come to the hospital now. Something's happened.\""]
